articles.author: By  JERUSALEM POST STAFF,  REUTERS
articles.title: Hamas armed wing says fate of Israeli-American hostage Edan Alexander unknown - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: This was after Hamas said on Tuesday it had lost contact with a group of terrorists holding Alexander in Gaza.
articles.content:
Hamas's armed wing said on Saturday the fate of Israeli-American hostage Edan Alexander was unknown after the group found the guard who was holding the hostage killed.
